text: @NikkiHaley Another "the Buck doesn't stop here" person. During a Natl Emergency, that is exactly the time that the Federal Government should step up. The Trump Administration hasn't. Haley following the GOP Playbook: Lie! Deny! Lie! Misinform! Lie! Blame everyone else! Lie! #COVID19
